item.description:
Release Notes 1.1.2

Bug Fixes & Improvements

  • Critical Fix: Resolved issue where Tab Bar would sometimes not appear or disappear.
  • Enhanced support for multiple window handling.
  • Various minor bug fixes and stability improvements.

Release Notes 1.1

Major Updates

  • Significant speed and stability improvements – The Tab Bar now performs much faster and smoother, even with a large number of tabs.
  • Enhanced animations – The Tab Bar's presentation animations are now more fluid and responsive.

Bug Fixes

  • Resolved tab tracking issues with Chrome and Safari.

New Features

  • Improved tab tracking support for additional languages: Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Polish, and Japanese.
  • Added compatibility with beta versions of Chrome, Firefox, and VS Code for tab tracking.

Refinements

  • Numerous UI improvements for a more polished user experience.
